titles.title: Authorizing the use of the rotunda of the Capitol for a dedication ceremony incident to the placement of a bust of Raoul Wallenberg in the Capitol.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.
Mr. Ehlers asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection. (CR H9715)
Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote. (CR S14851)
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 08/04/1995--Introduced. Allows the use of the rotunda of the Capitol on November 2, 1995, for a ceremony incident to the placement of a bust of Raoul Wallenberg in the Capitol as previously authorized by the Congress.
